name: Portrail
description:
Life is short and there are plenty of wonderful people in this world. Meet them, read their life advice, stay for a while and go on to discover others.

All portraits in this game are of real people who attended the Train Jam 2018 and what they said while travelling from Chicago to San Francisco on the 15-17th March 2018.

Portraits were drawn on the train by Aaron San Filippo and Rosa Carbo-Mascarell.
The game was made in Phaser while on the train by Pavle Goloskokovic.
Music composed and recorded on the train by Michael Hoffmann.

Thank you to everyone who let themselves be drawn!
